message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $200.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. I'm confident you won't find a better offer for this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $170 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
